author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IFG Says ‍Group James Hay Has Added More Than 6,000 New Clients In 2017
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Ifg Group Plc:
* ‍GROUP CONTINUES TO MAKE GOOD PROGRESS IN IMPLEMENTATION OF ITS STRATEGY OF DEVELOPING ITS TWO FIRST CLASS, CLIENT-CENTRIC BUSINESSES.​
* ‍JAMES HAY HAS ADDED MORE THAN 6,000 NEW CLIENTS IN 2017, AN INCREASE OF OVER 30% COMPARED TO 2016​
* ‍SAUNDERSON HOUSE HAS ADDED 247 NEW CLIENTS COMPARED TO 215 IN 2016, DRIVEN BY FASTER THAN ANTICIPATED GROWTH IN ITS NEW DISCRETIONARY MANAGEMENT OFFERING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
